us.pserver.remote.http

Class Header

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.pserver.remote.http.Header
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HttpConst
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpHexObject, RequestLine, ResponseLine

    public class Header
extends java.lang.Object
implements HttpConst
    Representa um cabeçalho do protocolo HTTP.
    Version:
    1.0 - 21/01/2014
    Author:
    Juno Roesler - juno.rr@gmail.com
